com.dbteku.orbit.core

Class Actor<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dbteku.orbit.core.Actor<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.dbteku.orbit.interfaces.Animatable<T>, com.dbteku.orbit.interfaces.EngineListener, com.dbteku.orbit.interfaces.InputListener, com.dbteku.orbit.interfaces.WorldListener<T>

    public abstract class Actor<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.dbteku.orbit.interfaces.EngineListener, com.dbteku.orbit.interfaces.WorldListener<T>, com.dbteku.orbit.interfaces.InputListener, com.dbteku.orbit.interfaces.Animatable<T>
    This class is to represent objects on the simulation screen.

      • isTouching

        public boolean isTouching(java.lang.Class<T> cls)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
